title: Adult Social Care and Ethical Care Charter

content:
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Please provide the following information:
1. Since signing UNISON's Ethical Care Charter, which stages of the charter have the council implemented and at what dates?
2. Has your council adopted UNISON's Residential care charter?
3. The list of providers that the council has contracted to provide domiciliary/home care since 2011, with the accompanying dates.
4. The list or providers that the council has contracted to provide residential care since 2011, with the accompanying dates.
Please provide a response to the @whatdotheyknow.com email address this email was sent from.
Yours faithfully,
Bo Jacobs Strom

Dear Bo Jacobs Strom,
Thank you for your request for information relating to Adult Social Care
and Ethical Care Charter which we received on 27/06/2023.
This has been logged as a Freedom of Information Request and will be dealt
with under the Freedom of Information Act 2000. The reference number for
your request can be found above.
The Freedom of Information Act 2000 states that we must respond to you
within 20 working days, by 25/07/2023. Please do not hesitate to contact
us at the email address below if you have any queries.
Yours sincerely,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
Email: [1][Sheffield City Council request email]
From: Bo Jacobs Strom <[FOI #995094 email]>
Sent: Tuesday, June 27, 2023 1:56 PM
To: FOI <[Sheffield City Council request email]>
Subject: Freedom of Information request - Adult Social Care and Ethical
Care Charter
Dear Sheffield City Council,
Please provide the following information:
1. Since signing UNISON's Ethical Care Charter, which stages of the
charter have the council implemented and at what dates?
2. Has your council adopted UNISON's Residential care charter?
3. The list of providers that the council has contracted to provide
domiciliary/home care since 2011, with the accompanying dates.
4. The list or providers that the council has contracted to provide
residential care since 2011, with the accompanying dates.
Please provide a response to the @whatdotheyknow.com email address this
email was sent from.
Yours faithfully,
Bo Jacobs Strom

Dear Bo Jacobs Strom,
Thank you for your request for information relating to Adult Social Care
and Ethical Care Charter which we received on 27/06/2023. This request has
been logged as closed on our system, but we cannot see the reply. We
apologise if you have not received this before and are attaching the
reply.
The information provided in this response is available for re-use under
the terms of the Open Government Licence v3.0. The terms of the OGL can be
found [1]here. When re-using the information, Sheffield City Council
requires you to include the following attribution statement: “Contains
public sector information obtained from Sheffield City Council and
licensed under the Open Government Licence v3.0.”
If you are unhappy with the response you have received in relation to your
request, you are entitled to have this reviewed. You can ask for an
internal review by replying to this email. Internal review requests should
be submitted within 40 working days from the date of this response. Of
course we acknowledge and apologise for the significant delay in
responding.
If you remain dissatisfied with the outcome of your internal review, you
can contact the Information Commissioner’s Office. Please see
[2]
https://ico.org.uk/make-a-complaint/offi...
for further details.
Kind Regards,
Sheffield City Council
PO Box 1283
Sheffield, S1 1UJ
